net.librec.math.structure

Class SparseVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.math.structure.SparseVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<VectorEntry>

    public class SparseVector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<VectorEntry>, java.io.Serializable
    Data Structure: Sparse Vector whose implementation is modified from M4J library
    Author:
    guoguibing and Keqiang Wang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
